website_summaries.verdict: A sound option if you prefer a stainless steel finish, but other options have a bit more to offer.
pros: A popular model with 17 versatile tools and a sleek stainless steel finish
The blades are very sharp and the pliers have a reliable grip
cons: It's on the higher end of the price spectrum but has fewer tools than some cheaper choices

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tool
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why the other buyer rated two stars for having received a defective model, then after issues with the seller proceeded to receive a functional unit that they are pleased works. Then another buyer complaining that they have "changed nothing". They didn't need to. They made the needle nose pliers have the teeth further apart making grip more agressive, and the wire cutters are now replaceable. Otherwise it's a solid multitool from Leatherman that will be used by me for years and years to come. Buy one, keep it in the car or your desk or your toolbox. Thank Leatherman later for all the times it comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Well designed and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - sturdy - looks good, black finish looks cool - tools are functional and not overwhelming - scissors are very useful and are sturdy and spring action - pliers are perfectly mated - interchangeable screwdriver bits - comes with a pouch Cons: - doesn't come with a clip - included pouch isn't that useful and doesn't have accessory pockets like I've heard come with past versions - black finish scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dang Huynh

customer_reviews.title: I love my new wave +
customer_reviews.text: I love my new wave +. It is very comfortable and easy to open/close knife with one hand. The seller Hardware Sales Inc. posted a picture in the description with the new leatherman sheath but sent me a different sheath. When I contacted them they were quick to respond and honored our sale. This is a great product and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Don

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Inferior design and materials. Blades flex excessively and come unlocked. Phillips screw driver only has 2 engagement points leading to more stripped screws than loosened. Pier jaws do not align and have to be pried open. This was my last Leatherman purchase. To add injury to insult there was a $15 restocking fee.
customer_reviews.author: Refinery rat

customer_reviews.title: Great range of applications.
customer_reviews.text: Ready for the abuse. Never really knew about multi tools other than Swiss Army knives until I got called out carrying pliers to a party. This thing has it all. It's the main tool I use for work (network admin), camping, fishing, and I will even put it in my pocket when I perform in orchestra. I've been on stage and had to tighten screws mid performance because my bass clarinet would stop responding. Chose this model over Rebar because of the exchangeable bits, scissors, and the wire cutters are now replaceable in the plus model (2018). The Surge would be too big for me since I'm not needing the beefier tools like a tradesman.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in you Leatherman
customer_reviews.text: Leatherman disappoints me for once. I am the proud owner if the LEATHERMAN wave which got me out of several troubles in the past 7 years. decided to get the Wave +, it arrived in a box with the fabric pouch.....no issues there. My issues stemmed from the effectiveness of the build....hopefully it's a one off. When I inverted to use the pliers the wood saw was loose and almost nipped my pinky off.....albeit I handled a little incorrectly but I know the build and reputation of leatherman so disnt expect the blade to be loose and have "play". Very dissatisfied. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dansarge

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Can't believe their QC didnt catch it.
customer_reviews.text: Wave + was received today to replace a multitool from a different company. One half of the tool opens as expected and the other half is so stiff it can only be opened with significant force and is also extremely difficult to close. After working it for an hour and trying to clean with a solvent it has not improved. Edit: soaked in solvent some more and got it to open semi freely which is great. Then one of the Torx security heads broke off and made this thing useless again. Still going to have to send it in. Dont order one
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good Metal
customer_reviews.text: Good metal, I wish the knife were a tad sharper and the small screw driver is just a little smaller then I wanted since I wanted it for taking apart laptops on the go while it's more for repairing glasses. I've gotten a lot mileage from the scissors, the file and the pliers these last couple of months which are all very solid and well made. I think that when it comes to being prepared for day to day life a Smart phone with a decent suite of Ap's, a Leatherman, wallet, and keys with a pen light attached is pretty much the ultimate loadout that one can fit in their pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hebden-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. It’s popular for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for an older wave that I had lost. The easy open package was definitely easy, it came open during shipping so everything was just floating around in the shipping envelope. The sheath it came with is pretty nice but I have my doubts about the longevity of the Velcro. I got the black one and it came pretty well oiled to the point that I had to wash my hands and give the tool a good wipe down. Other than that, it was exactly what I knew I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: great tool that i know will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: great tool that i know will last a long time. only issue is that the black coating/oil gets everywhere when you first open it... you have to wipe it down when you get it but that is a small price to pay for a tool that will last as long as this one will
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Anastasi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible very brittle
customer_reviews.text: Horrible my dad gave me the wingman and broke the tip of the knife twice because i used it as a flat head screwdriver obviously my fault so bought the wave plus thinking it was worth it second day used the actual flat head screwdriver and the tip broke on that horrible cheap quality my knock off leatherman is more sturdy than this junk now trying to find out how to get my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Q.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after opening twice. Never even put it to use. Pliers are stuck
customer_reviews.text: Upon the original unboxing, everything seemed to work fine. Opened up each blade/tool with no problems. Other than the grease or whatever rubs off from the black coating. Which I don't really mind. Put back in the box for about a week. Go to use it and it will not even open the pliers. Right side opens and left is just stuck and will not open up. Heard so many reviews about this and was very excited but apparently they are wrong or I got a lemon. First experience with Leatherman and I will not be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really regretting my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The blades all came dull and that is not okay. The serrated blade is beyond useless, as well as, the straight edge. I dunno if I was unlucky, but yeah. I'm not pleased with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality overall and extremely useful item to have around
customer_reviews.text: Great quality overall and extremely useful item to have around. Only complaint is the screw bits can be extremely difficult to remove from the bit extension. I often have to use the pliers to remove the screw bit which is not ideal. Also, the included carry case is good quality but only holds the multi-tool and no space for the drill bits or extension. Given the choice I would prefer a case that also holds the drill bits and extension.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to operate one handed
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've been disappointed with a Leatherman product. I read the reviews, & someone complained about how stiff his was. I assumed it was his bad luck. Nope, it's mine as well. I plan on buying the specialty wrenches to try loosening the hinge points. My gripe, is that I shouldn't have to do that. Ordering on line is getting more & more like Russian Roulette.
customer_reviews.author: David G Penick

customer_reviews.title: Initial look is great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I recently lost my Leatherman Wave that I've carried daily for over 20 years. I like it better than the new one. The different size common screwdrivers fit various scope screws, and I don't think I'll ever use the tiny common screwdriver they come with now. I do like the replaceable wire cutter parts. Other than the screwdriver part I like the new one as well and I think they send a better case now. Certainly a buy recommendation, but will always wonder if I should have searched Ebay for a vintage one that meets my needs (slightly) better.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Guy

customer_reviews.title: Look at everything you get from Amazon immediately...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a “Wave Plus”, which is my favorite multitool. As soon as it came in, I misplaced it in my living room. When I found it yesterday, the box was right, but the tool inside was a Crunch,” whatever that is... My window to return it has passed, so I paid over $100 for a tool I don’t need or want. AAARGH!
customer_reviews.author: Bro. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and a bit bulky and heavy, but it deserves it's five stars.
customer_reviews.text: This multitool has an excellent set of tools, all of which are easily deployed and lock into place. Quality as with other Leatherman tools is excellent and the general versatility of this particular tool can't be beat. All of the built in tools are extremely well made and will give years of heavy duty service. You can add the add on bit set and increase it's versatility even more. It really is a bit to heavy and bulky to be carried in your pocket, but the included nylon snap top sheath is compact and works very well as a belt sheath. If you want one Multitool to do everything - this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McCray

customer_reviews.title: You are purchasing a used/ refurbished/ floor tool at full price.
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: This is not a review of the tool itself but rather the tool purchased through this vendor on amazon. It is extremely clear that you are receiving a used/ refurbished Multitool for full price from this vendor. The tool is entirely covered in hairline scratches. I understand that the black coating scratches easily and that they test each of their tools. I have several leatherman multitools with this coating. NONE have ever come this scuffed and scratched. It is very difficult to see from the photo. This in NO WAY effects the performance, however, you are paying full price for a used tool when purchased through this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Derek R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect update for this tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the replaceable cutters. I needed a medium sized multi tool that would fill a bunch of rolls. Work, outdoors and a true EDC item. The replacable cutters made this a much more useful tool for me. Great job Leatherman 👍
customer_reviews.author: Bishop Reigns

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! This is 2 year old stock on bad shape. Its the older velcro style case and should be the snap. It shipped in a repair box. No bubble wrap, no protection. The handles are very beat up, this is a refurb at best.
customer_reviews.author: Randall BryanTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Updated 7/15/20: I reached out to leatherman about the finish on this tool and received the following response "The black oxide finish is a very special type of finish that not everyone likes, it is either a love it or hate it situation. These tools are used mostly by military and law enforcement personnel who require a high “concealment” factor in their professions, due to the life and death situations they may find themselves in. " The tool functions amazing, just buy the silver if you do not like the look of the attached pics! The black finish on this arrived scratched and the entire tool was so dirty(see pics). The packaging was pretty much destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Beckford

customer_reviews.title: Best One Yet
customer_reviews.text: I've had a dozen or so Leatherman tools in the last decade. In my opinion this version of the Wave is the best so far. Would've given it 5 stars if it had the new nylon sheath with the canteen snap. I ended up buying one aftermarket locally. I honestly don't know how anyone gets through their day without one. I swear I use mine a dozen or more times per day. If I was headed to work and realized I forgot my wallet, I'd just keep on going. If I forgot my Leatherman (or Surefire light) I'd turn back around and go get it. Good job Leatherman. You obviously listen to your customers.
customer_reviews.author: The River Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best is now better!
customer_reviews.text: The Wave is simply the best tool in the Leatherman line hands down! This update brings a fantastic solution to the wire cutters where the wire cutting blade is replaceable. I’ve cut thick wire with the previous version and crimped the blade, locking up the pliers in an annoying fashion. Very pleased with this update!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wendel

customer_reviews.title: Good product from a good brand, but quality has begun to diminish.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a number of Leatherman multitools over the years, and comparing the Wave Plus side by side with my original Wave, the build quality seems to be lacking. The metal feels and looks a bit cheaper, and the first one I ordered on Amazon, the serrated blade was stuck. I had to use the pliers on my other Leatherman to open the blade. The one advantage with the Plus is, of course, the replaceable wire cutters. That’s one feature I wish I had on my original Wave.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor W.

customer_reviews.title: pliers get caught on the phillips bit when closing - on both wave + purchases
customer_reviews.text: when closing the pliers the tip of the pliers get rigidly caught on the edge of the phillips head bit. this happened on both of the wave plus purchases i made. the pliers tip gouges the side of the phillips when trying to close. only remedy i found without returning was the flip the phillips with the screwdriver bit. other than this defect the rest of the quality and fit seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: aco

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Leatherman PST for more than 35 years, i wanted a saw blade so i bought the wave plus. the only complaint i have with Leatherman is the piece of junk nylon case that came free with the knife, Leatherman you have such a great reputation , just leave the case out. I purchased the Leatherman Heritage Leather Sheath the next day and i am very pleased with the fit and look of it. Keep up the great work Leatherman
customer_reviews.author: Viggen

customer_reviews.title: Good but used
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but make sure you get a new one and not a used one. Mine came in with scratches and wear and tear. Will update after the replacement comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Azavelli

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made tool. Already have used it several times and wonder how I got along without it! Great for farm type use. Highly recommend the optional pocket clip. Works well with shorts without a belt.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my older Leatherman. This one is a little more versatile, having both a saw and a file (my old one I had to remove and install the one I wanted and never seemed to have the one I needed), and this one is a bit lighter. The scissors aren't quite as convenient since the tool needs to be opened to deploy them, but that's the tradeoff for having two knife blades, a saw, and a file on the outside of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: RichL

customer_reviews.title: improve Wave.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Leatherman wave over 20yrs. Ago..and i felt in love with it...till the tip of the pliers just broke off..I've been still using it..but I decided that it was time for a new one...and the wave plus..is definitely and improvement, maybe cus is new, but it just feels smoother, when you are getting all the tools in and out, and the lock mechanism is great..
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Features I like: 1) You can really use the tools as viable substitutes for standard tools. The tools work like they are supposed to 2) Easy to access all tools once you understand where they all are 3) Nylon pouch attaches to my belt so this tool replaces my tool bag for simple maintenance tasks around the house 4) Sharp knife holds its edge 5) Quality feel and look. Robust construction that feels ergonomically correct. Attention to detail give a quality look I would buy again. It would make a nice gift
customer_reviews.author: SuperZoo

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a gift for someone who always wanted one
customer_reviews.text: This Leatherman was recommended by someone who knows quality, and who is never without his. You wouldn't believe the times it comes in handy. So, I ordered it as a gift for someone else we both know, who I knew would appreciate it, and he did. Communication from the seller was excellent, and it was delivered a day earlier than expected. Very pleased with the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nothing less than awesome
customer_reviews.text: so i bought one. great multitool. but then the wifey got ahold of it for gardening. we (she) cut down a 20 foot bamboo, and i was like cool. then she kept using it for cutting using the serrated blade. So i gifted one to my bor-inlaw. He also loved it. So i bought another one just for garden work. thats 3 so far. if/when wifey paints it pink i will post pics, LOL
customer_reviews.author: valarok

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Leatherman Wave + what else do you need to know you could save the world with this bad boy !!! I got the add on pocket clip also very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well made! worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing multi tool ! It replaced my leatherman rebar because it carries easier in my pocket even though it’s heavier! I didn’t understand it either what all the fuss was about with the wave but now I own one and I can easily access the players one handed with a flick of the wrist. Also the knife blades are accessible from the outside which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Keep the TSA's Hands Off of This One
customer_reviews.text: I go through pocket knives quite a bit, because I forget to leave them in the car at the airport. After losing my last knife to TSA, I went without for a good bit because I didn't want to just throw money out the window. I stumbled across this knife one night, and I am glad I did. I've owned leatherman knives before, but this one is by far my favorite. It's heavy duty enough to get the job done, but not so big that it can't fit in your pocket (although it doe take a little getting used to).
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item thinking is was going to be an upgrade from my previous leather man tool but I was disappointed when I opened my package to a damaged box and dysfunctional tool. The spring on the pliers weren’t working, I couldn’t access the other tools because they were jammed and hard to pull out and the whole thing was covered in what seemed car grease or oil.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ortega

customer_reviews.title: best multi-tool I've seen
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my original Wave. The only complaint I had was the wire cutters not being replaceable. Looks like Leatherman finally figured out they should add that feature to their best ever multitool. Around the house I use it for everything since it's always handy instead of going out to the garage and finding something in the toolbox. I haven't run into a situation yet that I needed a regular tool where the Wave couldn't handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly balanced multitool
customer_reviews.text: Just switched form Gerber multitool to Leatherman wave plus and what a difference in quality. Everything perfectly finished, pliers are not loose and all the tools are perfectly balanced. You got all you need with the tool. The only thing I don't like which was I had in Gerber is spring-action pliers. Apart from this everything is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my original Leatherman to Homeland Security at the airport in Phoenix. Forgot I had it in the bag. Either lose it or miss the plane. So.....replaced it with the newer Wave model. Has much more stuff on it than I think I'll ever need, but it's always good to be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Allen L. Feris

customer_reviews.title: A very useful tool in the real world
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself is quite nice, but I made a mistake getting the black finish, where it comes off on my hands, leaving minor stains (that are easy to wash off, however). Eventually, I am sure that the stains will stop (after all, there is only so much finish to come off), but the tool itself is otherwise quite effective, and well worth keeping in one's backpack.
customer_reviews.author: hellokitty

customer_reviews.title: Leatherman
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I suggest ordering security torx bits to tighten any loose attachments. They will loosen with use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: It is the best of the tools available for your hip.
customer_reviews.text: This my third one because I use them constantly and things like the cutter for wire wear (note this one has a replaceable cutter blade) and I don’t believe that is a corporate issue so I buy a new one and place the old in a tool box for whatever it can still do effectively. I’ve tried others but this for me is the Gold Standard.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Bird

customer_reviews.title: Best multitool for everything
customer_reviews.text: For the everyday mutlitool, the wave plus is great. I bought the black one, just clean it like a gun, oil anything where metal is against metal and this thing is great. The box was all banged up but who cares. Molle sheath? fine ill take it just so the wave plus doesn't scratch my phone when its in my bag. Best part about Leatherman? USA made and assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel82

customer_reviews.title: Great utility tool for all kinds of repairs
customer_reviews.text: With a tool like the Leatherman Wave+, you have all the tools you need in one place for all kinds of repairs. I used to only carry a utility tool for hiking and camping, but I discovered it is great to carry around with you all the time, as you never know when you need a tool to assist you in your time of need.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hegel

customer_reviews.title: Most important tool I own!
customer_reviews.text: There’s not a day that goes by without my Wave Leatherman on my side. Absolutely essential tool for a DIY selfer like me as I use it multiple times a day regardless the activity. I’ve also experimented with all the different Leatherman models, and hands down the Wave is my favorite and I’ve had no less than 20 over the years.
customer_reviews.author: bill fite

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I can live without one of these on my side. I hen been using Leatherman tools for well over 30 years. They are top quality and any time they fail which has only been twice it’s been my own fault. The first time I sent it back for repair but it didn’t seam fair to do it the 2nd time. I highly recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: There is a Reason it is so POPULAR
customer_reviews.text: This tool just plain works! Smooth Action, Excellent sharpness out of the box for the main knife. Everything is well placed and works when i need it. From Stripping Wires, pulling out fish hooks, all the way for opening packages. Doesn't matter what I need it for. It is on my hip and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Best multi tool. Hands down.
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with the Leathermsn wave. Ive got one for each vehicle emergency bag. Trusted. Reliable. Sturdy. You get what you pay for with this high quality multi tool!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Best of the best.
customer_reviews.text: Best of the best. Love the knife on the exterior so you don’t have to open it up to get to it. I wish everything was designed and made as well as this thing. Gave it to my son as a hs graduation gift. Hope he uses it like I’ve used mine over the past 20 years or so.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gaston

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, in this case, you get high quality.
customer_reviews.text: There are many less expensive multitools for sale out there, but they just don't compare to the incredible attention to detail that the folks from leatherman put into their products. There is a reason this Made in USA product is the best. You won't regret spending a little more money for a tool that you will have for probably the rest of your life.
customer_reviews.author: Online Student

customer_reviews.title: A gotta have tool.
customer_reviews.text: There are so many times when this has come in handy. I would feel lost without it. The scissors and pliers are most frequently used, with the blades coming next. It is small enough to be inconspicuous yet strong and well built to meet my demands.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy O

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever made
customer_reviews.text: I'm a handyman. This tool by far is the best tool I own I use this thing 6 7 8 12 times a day always if I don't have it on me which is rare my day is completely screwed. Can't live without it highly highly highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very Fine Multitool...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Wave+ over half a dozen other high-end multitool I own. Makes no sense, however, not to include a bit kit and an extension (and a case to accommodate all of it). Listen up, Leatherman...If necessary, add another $20 to the price tag - but deliver a complete product to your Customers. Nevertheless, Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: This is my third Wave. Used 7 days a week.
customer_reviews.text: Has the right mix of tools for the jack of all trades. The replaceable wire cutter blades are a really great addition! Used for the last 20 years in a hardware store. Cannot even estimate the number of things I have repaired for my customers with it. Wish I could get replacement tools for it. Now that I am retired I"m sure the new one will see me out. Just wish they would go back to the original "all" leather case.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful With The Pliers
customer_reviews.text: The use of the pliers is dangerous, will pinch your hand, you have to make sure you clutch this carefully, in short the pliers are not so good, the one handed deployment of the knife is great, an the rest of the tools are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sabacon

customer_reviews.title: As Pele used to say...."Don't Leave Home Without It!"
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Leatherman Wave. Nothing not to like. Use it daily and with the optional belt clip it's always with me, and close at hand!
customer_reviews.author: bigeasy

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Durable. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The one downside to the black finish, is that it needs to be thoroughly wiped down, as there is a black layer that will rub off on your hands if you don't. It's well oiled at all hinge points. This thing is a tough well built machine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Best multitool
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff when you first get it. Loosens up with use. Tools are great and lock up. Pliers are fantastic. Knife is sharp and just needs a quick strop out of the box. Buy this multitool and order a pocket clip for it. Only complaint is that it doesn't come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mix of tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mix of tools, all laid out very well. Love, love, love the access to the knives directly, without the need to open the tool. Locking mechanisms are secure, yet easy to release when you want. The nylon belt pouch works well, I like the snap that it uses (instead of velcro that is on some).
customer_reviews.author: bobbruner

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, poor oxide coating.
customer_reviews.text: It might not be that there's a problem with the black oxide coating, just that it scrapes off incredibly easy. I suppose that's part of the "worn" look, but it feels cheap. Love the wave though - one of my favorite models of Leatherman. This is the second one I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kryzm

customer_reviews.title: This is the most important tool I own !
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I have bought this; I lost the first one and gave the second one away. This is the most versatile tool I've ever had , I find myself using it 3or4 times a day! Everyone who does anything needs one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Demo

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I have a first generation Leatherman Wave and am constantly using it. My son liked it so much , he made the comment that he's like one, so I bought this multi tool for my son for Christmas. It's a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Skyguy131313

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have especially in a pinch.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several of these over the years, some “disappeared” on job sites, TSA got one, but I’ve always gone back, they are a handy tool especially in a pinch. I had one where the plier jaw broke and they replaced no charge. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: J.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves black all over fingers
customer_reviews.text: I love wave leathermans and always wanted the black one. Very disappointed that every time I use it, my hands get black. Not sure if it’s from the paint or what. But it’s hard to get off
customer_reviews.author: Carlyplett

customer_reviews.title: Leatherman wave+🥰🥰👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am still in love with my leatherman she has aged like good wine and will probably outlast my marriage! The only issue I had at first was with the pliers not opening properly/stiff has gone after usage and a little 3 in one oil...I take this little lady with me everywhere I go and she is yet to disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: R.Adams

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: They could have added the spring to the pliers like they did on Wingman . But it will do without it to. Its better quality. I have both Wingman and Wave+ , the wingman will need to be properly tightened from time to time or you cannot use the scissors. Wave + worth the money, you can jump right to it :
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Leatherman wave.
customer_reviews.text: I have two waves and love them. One in stainless and one in black. I carry one with me everywhere. Very versatile for its size and weight. Best leather man I’ve used. Others are too bulky and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Faris

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It broke and bend like it was a cheap Chinese piece of metal, i expected something way more durable and with higher quality coming from leatherman.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not $100 quality
customer_reviews.text: The teeth on the pliers don't line up, the can open and screwdriver we're loose upon arrival. The fact the most used tools are on the outside is nice but the knife isn't made of the best steel, won't hold a edge very long. For $100 though I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Can't do without

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dialy use

customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and workmanship

customer_reviews.author: Todd M Peterson

customer_reviews.author: Drue Williams

customer_reviews.title: No leather case with this LEATHERman

customer_reviews.author: PDI

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I’m a farmer and carry this tool every day. We love this tool. I like having a saw, file, and non serrated knife on my multi tool. I wish the pliers were a little wider so I could twist fence wire with it. I also wish it had an awl or something else besides the eyeglass screwdriver. I hope they make these changes on a tool in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cody B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful multi tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multi tool! The selection of tools is exactly what I need. It will come in very handy. The quality is exceptional! Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Great edc
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day! My go to tool. Needs to be broken in at first. Very tight tools and opening and closing pliers. Black wears off on friction points after break in. Kinda wish i would've gotten the silver one but no regrets. Edc in my pocket with separately bought pocket clip. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L.

customer_reviews.text: The best feature of this tool, along with other Leatherman, is the ability to open the knife without unfolding it. My smaller Leatherman needs to be opened first to access the knife The nylon sheath is garbage though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have

customer_reviews.author: james keough

customer_reviews.title: If you could only have one Leatherman, this is it.

customer_reviews.author: Danny L. McElvain

customer_reviews.title: If you buy just one multi tool buy the Leatherman Wave plus. Its fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: The leatherman Wave+ is an awesome multitool. I've owned other brands in the past but this Wave+ is just built like a tank. The different uses for this multi tool are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great edc multi tool for anything you could think of. My favorite qualities are the black finish and the interchangeable bits. The black coating does come off onto your fingers for about the first 5 days of handling the tool (not much comes off on your fingers) but after that it stops completely. Excellent quality and I'm expecting it to last for many years to come. This'll definitely be in my pocket every day of the week :)
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-tool!

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd Craftsman Wave. Use it all the time.
